title: Davide Cecotti
text: Davide Cecotti (born 10 April 1973 in <a href="Udine">Udine</a>) is an Italian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. Cecotti played once for <a href="Inter%20Milan">Inter Milan</a> during the <a href="1991%E2%80%9392%20Serie%20A">1991–92 Serie A</a> season.
